title: eLearning and Digital Education | FlexPay
summary: FlexPay's Invisible Recovery™ solution helps eLearning businesses minimize failed payments and reduce customer churn. By intelligently adapting to payment declines, it optimizes recovery rates, leading to increased customer lifetime value and revenue growth.
key_points: Reduces customer churn in eLearning by addressing failed payments.
AI-powered Invisible Recovery™ optimizes payment recovery strategies.
Increases customer LTV and company revenue by recovering failed payments.
